name: RPS-Online
description:
Play Rock Paper Scissors, with your friends, via the power of the Internet.
Support for direct networking, and temporary use of the UPNP system.

KNOWN CRASHES: For the host, specifically, the entire game will sometimes crash  on disconnect while the results screen is displayed. I have no idea why this is.

Crossplay between systems has not been tested, please comment if it works or not!

Source code is available here: https://github.com/Plet53/RPS-Online
